scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd .. && cd server && npm install
scripts.prettify: find . -name "*.tsx" -o -name "*.ts" | grep -v -f .gitignore | xargs npm run prettier:base
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build:prod && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.deploy: source .env.prod && SERVER_HOST=$SERVER_HOST TEAM_ID=$TEAM_ID npm run build && cd server/dist && now --public -e SLACK_CLIENT_ID=$SLACK_CLIENT_ID -e SLACK_VERIFICATION_TOKEN=$SLACK_VERIFICATION_TOKEN -e SLACK_CLIENT_SECRET=$SLACK_CLIENT_SECRET -e MONGO_URL=$MONGO_URL && now alias
